answers.answer: You can definitely gain weight from eating snacks without insulin, and I strongly recommend that you maintain your insulin treatments even as you try to lose weight.You make a great point that it can be more difficult to lose weight with Type I Diabetes - I think it would be very helpful if you met with a nutritionist to get started - their expertise could be very useful in your situation.

question: I am trying to lose 15-20 pounds and I heard that it is hard to lose weight with type 1 diabetes. Because I have type 1 diabetes I was just wondering what I should do to shed the extra pounds? I was also wondering if you gain weight from eating snacks with out insulin?Thanks!
title: Weight loss with type 1 diabetes
